sentences.cn: 只限女性成员的住房合作社

sentences.en: Cooperative life - styles also differ according to the environment.
sentences.cn: 集体的生活风格也随环境的不同而不同.

sentences.en: For a moment he did not mind being a little more cooperative.
sentences.cn: 有一会儿他不反对再进一步合作.

sentences.en: He was doing his best to be cooperative.
James is a very helpful and cooperative lad.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯是个肯帮忙、好合作的小伙子。

sentences.en: Some small cooperative enterprises share out very well.
sentences.cn: 有些小型的合作企业盈利非常极好.

sentences.en: The development of new technology is dependent upon a cooperative, multidisciplinary team approach.
sentences.cn: 新技术的开发有赖于协作的 、 多学科的队伍来实现.

sentences.en: The name " Cooperative Extension Service " originates from the form of organization.
sentences.cn: “ 合作推广局 ” 这个名称取义于这个组织的形式.

sentences.en: The people in the village were cooperative; they helped us in every way they could.
sentences.cn: 村里的人很愿合作, 他们在各方面都尽力帮助我们.

sentences.en: The requirements of cooperative and centralized systems make the acceptance of standards of vital importance.
sentences.cn: 对合作化和集中化系统的要求使接受标准化变得非常重要.

sentences.en: The workmen are very cooperative, so the work goes on smoothly.
sentences.cn: 工人们十分合作, 所以工作进展顺利.

sentences.en: There is already an extensive cooperative medical service.
sentences.cn: 合作医疗已经有了广大的发展.

sentences.en: They are trying to adopt a more cooperative posture.
sentences.cn: 他们正试图采取更为合作的态度.

sentences.en: This increase is a cooperative phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 这种增加是一种协同现象.

sentences.en: VI. Strengthening management on charges for Sino - foreign cooperative education.
sentences.cn: 要加强对中外合作办学收费的管理.

sentences.en: We decided to set up a cooperative.
sentences.cn: 我们决定开办一家合作社.

sentences.en: We thank you for your cooperative efforts.
sentences.cn: 我们感谢你方努力合作.

words.tran_cn: 合作，协作；[劳经] 协力

phrases.tran_cn: n. 合作银行；储蓄贷款协会

trans.tran_en: a business or organization owned equally by all the people working there
